title: Apple
description: An innovative tech company famous for iPhones, iPads, and MacBooks.

title: Samsung
description: A multinational conglomerate producing electronics and home appliances.

title: Nike
description: A global leader in athletic footwear, apparel, and equipment.

title: Adidas
description: A global sportswear brand offering shoes, apparel, and accessories.

title: Microsoft
description: A technology company known for Windows, Office, Xbox, and cloud services.

title: Sony
description: A multinational electronics and entertainment company.

title: Canon
description: A leading brand in cameras, imaging, and optical products.

title: GoPro
description: A popular brand for action cameras and adventure filming technology.

title: DJI
description: A leading company in drone technology and aerial photography devices.
